thread.title: BRIEF-Piton Capital Partners Says On April 4, Proposed To Some Representatives Of Gulf Island Fabrication That Its Board Be Reduced In Size

title: BRIEF-Piton Capital Partners Says On April 4, Proposed To Some Representatives Of Gulf Island Fabrication That Its Board Be Reduced In Size
text:
April 6 (Reuters) - Gulf Island Fabrication Inc:
* PITON CAPITAL PARTNERS SAYS ON APRIL 4, PROPOSED TO SOME REPRESENTATIVES OF GULF ISLAND FABRICATION INC THAT ITS BOARD BE REDUCED IN SIZE - SEC FILING
* IDENTIFIED DIRECTORS TO GULFâ€™S BOARD * PITON CAPITAL PARTNERS SAYS ON APRIL 4, ALSO PROPOSED TO REDUCE THE AGGREGATE COMPENSATION AMOUNT PAID TO EACH GULF ISLAND FABRICATION DIRECTOR
* PITON CAPITAL PARTNERS LLC REPORTS A 7.9 PCT STAKE IN GULF ISLAND FABRICATION INC AS OF APRIL 4 Source text: [ bit.ly/2Iy5ug1 ] Further company coverage:
